\textbf{Bayesian Hierarchical Modeling \& Uncertainty Quantification (2022–2025)}
\vspace{-4pt}
\begin{itemize}[left=1.5mm, itemsep=1pt, topsep=0pt]
\item Developed hierarchical Bayesian models to estimate non-linear return functions, accounting for parameter uncertainty across distinct operating segments.
\item Implemented \textbf{shrinkage estimators} and \textbf{partial pooling} to stabilize inference in segments with sparse data
\item Analyzed posterior distributions to calculate confidence intervals and risk-adjusted probability of returns.
\end{itemize}
\vspace{-2pt}

\textbf{Behavioral Response Modeling under Market Volatility}
\vspace{-4pt}
\begin{itemize}[left=1.5mm, itemsep=0pt, topsep=1pt]
\item Estimated elasticity of input decisions in response to exogenous price shocks and stochastic weather events.
\item Modeled agent decision-making under uncertainty to predict shifts in risk exposure.
\item Aggregated micro-level behavioral parameters to forecast macro-level system outcomes.
\end{itemize}

\textbf{Spatial-Temporal Modeling of Loss Events (Ongoing)}
\vspace{-4pt}
\begin{itemize}[left=1.5mm, itemsep=0pt, topsep=1pt]

\item Quantified the financial impact of loss events on overall profit margins.
